home.ours_objective: Our goal is for you to achieve your goals in the cleanest way possible.

create-task.title: Before starting set your task
create-task.body: To stay focused, break down larger tasks into smaller , manageable steps. This makes tracking progress easier and keeps you motivated

set-time-goal.title: Set time goal
set-time-goal.body: Set a time goal to stay on track. Having a clear endpoint helps you maintain focus and boosts your productivity.

set-mode.title: Pomodoro or Flowmodoro ?
set-mode.body: Pomodoro uses short work intervals with breaks, while Flowmodoro adapts to your natural endpoint flow, allowing longer work periods.
